title: These conduction headphones are just $23 for Cyber Monday
content:
Macworld

In the market for a new set of headphones? Right now is a great time to shop because our Cyber Deals include these Open-Ear Conduction Stereo Wireless Headphones which will help you stay aware of your surroundings and enjoy a more comfortable listening experience. Through December 3, you can get them for more than $50 off at just $22.97.

These lightweight, comfortable headphones use bone conduction technology to send audio directly to the inner ears without obstructing your outer ear. They’re great for wearing at work or when you’re running in the city and want to be more aware of your surroundings. They last for up to six hours on a single charge, are IPX6 water-resistant, and are completely wireless thanks to Bluetooth.

Switch to bone conduction with these Open-Ear Conduction Stereo Wireless Headphones. Now through 11:59 pm ET on December 3, you can get them for more than 60% off $79 at just $22.97.

 

Open-Ear Conduction Stereo Wireless Headphones – $22.97
